name: Axesso - Amazon Data Service
description: The Axesso Amazon Data Service API returns detailed Amazon product information including product title, manufacturer, reviews, size selection, price, reviews and many more. Additionally, the API supports product recommendations as provided by Amazon and invoke keyword searches to find up to 20 products per page relating to the searchterm. This service is comparable to the Amazon Product Advertising API, but presented in a more condensed manner. The usage requires a API Key in production mode....

api_methods.name: lookupSeller
api_methods.description: Lookup seller details based on sellerid and domain

utterances.utterance: Can you provide the seller details for seller ID AD97MR4NOW5CD on the Amazon US site?
Lookup the seller information for seller ID B07XYZ1234 on the Amazon UK domain.
Show me the details of the seller with ID A1B2C3D4E5 on Amazon Germany.
Find seller information for seller ID ZYXWVUT987 on the Amazon Canada website.
Get details for the seller with ID 12345ABCDE on Amazon Japan.
Retrieve seller info for seller ID LMNOP67890 on the Amazon France domain.
Lookup seller details for seller ID QWERTY12345 on Amazon Italy.
Can you find the seller information for seller ID 9Z8Y7X6W5V on Amazon Spain?
Show me the seller details for seller ID 555AAA999 on Amazon Australia.
Get the seller information for seller ID XYZ1234567 on the Amazon Mexico site.
